ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisRe-appointment of MARC A. COURTOIS of Westmount, Quebec, as Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, effective October 12, 2012.
